It is refreshing to see the CSN Chicago postgame show express skepticism about how the team is being run. The corresponding Bulls postgame show was usually honest about the GarPax regime and that made it a good watch. It‚Äôs nice to hear real talk rather than trust-the-process BS.

Maybe we‚Äôll talk about it. Maybe we won‚Äôt. But if the Sox don‚Äôt make a splash tomorrow, which is looking increasingly likely, then Jerry and Rick are officially punting on seasons during the contention window. Just flat out not trying. They don‚Äôt deserve your kindness or money.

I don‚Äôt care. I care about process. It‚Äôs a problem if those three guys are unavailable on back-to-back days. Good for Ruiz, good for Lambert. They aren‚Äôt the guys who should be pitching in a 1-run game in the 8th and 9th.
